channel.title: Portfolios on Anna Vlassova
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Anna Vlassova

item.title: Adventure Playground for St. Albert's Primary School
item.description: Materials: Reclaimed wood, climbing holds cast with recycled plastic. Community build project with Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Jesmonite Bedside Table
item.description: Materials: Jesmonite, recycled plastic chips, reclaimed 18mm birch plywood. Made in collaboration with William Nelson for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Jesmonite Coffee Table
item.description: Materials: Jesmonite, recycled plastic chips, reclaimed 18mm birch plywood, metal bolt inserts. Flatpack design. Can be assembled and disassembled for transportation. Made in collaboration with William Nelson for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Laminated Coffee Table
item.description: Materials: Laminated top made of scrap wood and jesmonite with recycled plastic chips. Legs made with scrap pine and detachable metal inserts. Flatpack design. Can be assembled and disassembled for transportation. Made in collaboration with William Nelson for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Milking Stool
item.description: Materials: Reclaimed Scottish larch, naturally stained. Made for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Piano Stool
item.description: Materials: Tulipwood, copper, hand-embroidered upholstered seat. Dimensions: H 500 x W 556 x D 380mm

item.title: Workshop Entrance Sign
item.description: Materials: Reclaimed wood, laser cut sign, selection of boards showcasing wood work techniques such as veneer, lamination, carving etc.

item.title: Cherry Side Table
item.description: 2021 Hand carved cherry side table with maple legs.

item.title: Look Up!
item.description: Sight Specific, Solo Show, 2019 Wasps Studios, The Briggait, Glasgow Interactive sculptural work, Looking through the made work back out into the space and the viewer. Built on site Repurposed wood, aluminium, recycled paper, glass mirrors.

item.title: The Waiting Room
item.description: 2019 Glasgow School of Art Degree Show Sound work: Duration 15 minutes Metal collapsable frame, wood, headphones, mp3 players, hand printed flip books

item.title: With Hands That Make
item.description: With Hands That Make, 2019 Platform Community Arts Centre Film: Duration 10 minutes Made in Collaboration with the women of the Clak and Yak knitting group The film was the product of weekly chats whilst knitting blankets to donate to the NHS’s vulnerable mothers group.

item.title: Costumes That Make Walking Difficult
item.description: Costumes That Make Walking Difficult, 2018 Assembly Line, Group Show, The Pipe Factory Wearable sculptures that can be used by those attending the exhibition. Canvas, Rope, Bricks, Pine

item.title: Desk With Adjustable Shelves
item.description: Length 1.95m, Depth 0.6m, Height 0.7m 24mm Birch Plywood shelves from 12mm plywood and recycled wood Made with hand tools and finished with Osmo Hardwax Oil Clear Satin Finish

item.title: Desk With Bookshelves
item.description: 2021 Pine shelf and desk frame with Birch plywood top and shelves.

item.title: Just Hang In There
item.description: Just Hang In There, 2017 Loose Ends, Group Exhibition, The Barnes Building Photographic Series

item.title: Notes On Doing
item.description: Notes on Doing, 2019 The Barnes Building Interactive text and Sound piece: Standing, duration 2.5 minutes, Sitting: 2 minutes

item.title: Shape
item.description: A movement conversation. Photographic Performance in studio space.

item.title: The Body Clock
item.description: The Body Clock, 2019 Single Step Performance Night, McLellan Galleries, Durational Performance comprising of audience participation, following Sound Instruction work: Duration: 7 minutes

item.title: The Thinking Chair
item.description: Thinking Chair, 2018 DisFunctional Sculpture that forces sitter to be close to themselves. Hand made wooden chair.
